title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-20] [$250] Web - Markdown - Cursor overlaps with certain letters if quote markdown is applied
issue_repo_steps:

2. Open a chat
3. Click on + icon > submit an expense > Manual > Enter an amount and click next
4. Open description input field
5. Write "> Hey"

Expected result: The cursor doesn't overlap with the letter "y"

Actual result: None
